column6: Description(synopsis)
Gerard Butler fights against the odds in this war movie. A CIA operative and his translator flee from special forces in Afghanistan after exposing a covert mission. 2023
A young man obsessed with social media takes on a life-changing challenge from a mysterious older man, requiring him to venture into a forest where no man had ever come alive.
When her allergic reaction causes a misunderstanding, Susan unintentionally drives away with a handbag full of a coffee shop's cash.
CLAIRE, a 12-year-old girl tragically becomes an orphan after witnessing the gruesome murder of her parents by armed bandits.
This movie tackles cyber bullying in South Africa. A group of high school girls face the social humiliation of cyber bullying. They have to find ways to combat it.
A struggling accountant is given a big promotion, uprooting his family from their humble house to a luxury residence in Kasozi Heights. But a mystery begins to unravel.
A fun kids' animation that shows you do not have to be big to be brave. A young beluga whale embarks on a perilous journey to fulfil his ailing grandmother's last wish.

column2: Katy Perry The Movie: Part Of Me
column6: Get an intimate look at the life of pop sensation Katy Perry through her video diary. Follow her journey from a fledgling artist to a mega pop star and all the heartbreak and success that comes with it.

Dr Kauna opens Kauna's ER to bring quality emergency medical services to the Katutura community. Soon, teenage botched abortions become widespread and she vows to find the source, but at what cost? 2023
In order to save the life of her sister, a YouTube v-logger, Kaz must uncover the identity of a cyber stalker  as he exposes her secrets to her growing online community.
After a girl has an accident near a barren couple's home, she loses her memory. The desperate woman persuades her husband to keep the child, unaware of a larger conspiracy.
A man treats his wife like his slave so much that their only daughter does not respect her mother.
On her twelfth birthday, a young girl is gifted a mobile phone which  comes with the knowledge of her real identity.
A second-rate television series producer hits a homeless man with her car. To avoid any consequences, she takes him under her wing and offers him a small part in her show.
A proudly South African animation with the voice talents of Liam Neeson and Laurence Fishburne. A half-striped zebra embarks on an inspirational journey of self-discovery. 2013
Timmy earns  a role in the Romeo and Juliet play.  But rules will have to bend when it is learn that he was representing a school he doesn't belong to .
A progressive and ambitious woman researching on natural and organic cosmetics is mocked by her family and friends who find her ideas foolish for a globalised world.
A young man fakes his kidnap to scheme his family for a hefty ransom, this goes out of control, and he pray his family must meet the deadline to raise the ransom demanded.
Stuck in a bank under siege, a struggling reporter and frustrated bank manager form an interesting bond. Not everything is what it seems.

column2: Kill Chain: The Cyber War On America's Election
column6: A jaw-dropping documentary that extensively explores the vulnerabilities of electronic voting in the US. 2020
In a case of good versus evil, a troubled taxi driver finds himself walking on the dark side due to financial constraints and pressures to make ends meet at home.
A suspenseful thriller. A young woman finds herself at the mercy of a paranoid conspiracy theorist when her car breaks down in backcountry Oregon.
A thrilling drama. Following the death of her husband, Michelle and her daughter move into a condo for a fresh start. They discover that their fresh start has become a nightmare.
A high school senior becomes determined to uncover her new classmate's true identity as strange events take place at their school.
Chad Michael Murray and Bruce Willis star in this action thriller. A grieving battle veteran's life is disrupted when a cop and a drug cartel arrive on his property.
Arnold Schwarzenegger takes on a softer role in this crime comedy. A cop has his hands full when he goes undercover as a kindergarten teacher.
This insightful documentary looks at the final years of Martin Luther King, Jr. and how he battled to balance both the Black Power movement and the government. 2018
In this colossal action drama from director Peter Jackson, a film crew heads to a remote island to shoot a movie but encounter a legendary beast that could spell their end. 2005
What could be more treacherous than a woman making a king and his son fall in love with her? This could burn the entire kingdom to the ground.
After Igwe Ogboagu dies, his son the prince of the kingdom refuse to take his place as the king. This however spark interest in the heart of many to take the throne.
Omimi is infected with an heart disease that makes him loose consciousness frequently, but the villagers thinks he is possessed.
A kingdom where the prince killed his father, the king, just to take the throne from his brother. This will set the kingdom on fire.
Explore three of Earth's epic wilderness in this film by the creators of the multi-award-winning wildlife documentary "e;Stroop: Journey into the Rhino Horn War."e;
What if the only way two young Kwazulu Natal boys, can defeat the bullying local crime lord who's threatening their families, is through their belief that one can be a Bollywood hero.
A family that prays together, stays together. Troubles brews in Taiwo and Kehinde's homes that almost took their lives. After counseling, are the families able to unite again?
Two brothers get into conflict about inheritance after their father's death. They disagree on what to do, but things get worse when one brother decides to sell the wealth.
In this romantic drama a young teacher is determined to protect local children from the effects of alcoholism. She gets support for the cause, from a broken-hearted filmmaker.
Frans, a thirty-eight-year-old documentary director, is forced to take a step back and reevaluate his life after he was unexpectedly left in front of the altar for the second time.
Elias has a plan of stealing from his company, but he can only do this successfully with the help of Malik. However, Malik's greed takes over him.
Fun-loving comedy starring Katherine Heigl and Seth Rogen. After a wild night of partying, a career woman discovers that she's pregnant, with hilariously truthful consequences. 2007
Michael Keaton stars and directs this thriller about redemption. A contract killer with dementia is offered a chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.
Class and love collide in this South African film about a love triangle. A man content with his small town life falls for a beautiful stranger, but she is running from her fiancée.
An estranged father and son meet each other in a coffee shop while a crime takes place across the street.
After being cast away by her family as a child, a woman struggles to search for her true origins after discovering that she is from royal heritage and wields special powers.
The first day for something new creates the opportunity for success or failure. For Simoné it appears to be untimely, unplanned and unwanted.

Every year people from 70 countries across the Islamic world compete in the most prestigious Koran reciting contest. This is the story of three children who have dedicated their lives to memorising the 600 pages of the Koran.
In his quest for marital bliss,, a man's journey leads him to an older friend who is grappling with her own battles, stemming from her gift of clairvoyance.
Race and family are explored in this powerful and poignant South African film based on the true story of a girl who was removed from her Khoi tribe to serve Jan van Riebeeck.
Jack Black enters the mystic world of martial arts in this animated adventure. An obese, mild-mannered panda is thrown into the middle of a battle for the fate of China. 2008
When the murderous Lord Shen threatens China with a terrifying new weapon, Po must face a truth he never expected and defeat Shen for the good of Kung Fu.
Jack Black and the gang return for a third adventure-filled film. Po has finally found his father and his family, but a hidden threat looms over the reunion.
Po is chosen to become the spiritual leader of the Valley of Peace in the fourth instalment. He must train a new Dragon Warrior while a wicked sorceress plans to re-summon master villains.
Luke and Liam Hemsworth, and Russell Crowe drive this action movie. A US Army special forces unit is ambushed during a mission- their only hope - a remote Air Force drone operator. 2024
A riveting thriller riddled with dark humour. Ray learns his wife is having an affair and plans to kill himself. But his plans change when he's mistaken for a low-rent hitman.

Through never-before-seen footage and intimate interviews, this documentary looks at the brutal attack on two Stellenbosch students, Hannah Cornelius and Cheslin Marsh, at the hands of members of the Numbers gang in 2017.
A woman, who is down and out and works as an elf in a year-round Christmas store, meets a man who seems too good to be true. 2019.
This documentary tells the story of the first major outbreak of the novel coronavirus pandemic on the Diamond Princess cruise liner using footage shot by passengers and staff. 2021
Mel Gibson stars in this book-inspired crime mystery. A disgraced ex-cop comes out of retirement to investigate a murder in which an actor is accused of killing his wife.
A film with an old-school action feel. After civilization succumbs to a deadly pandemic and his wife is murdered, a special forces soldier flees to the wilderness. 2021
A man of Umuezi kingdom kills a fellow man because he married the women he wanted to marry. He swears that his daughters will suffer for the sins of their father.
Falling on hard times when the husband loses his job, a couple's situation worsens as the wife's insensitive attitude drives her back to her ex, complicating matters.
Aniocha and Anioma long fight on a piece of land is about to tear Anioma apart as the king will do anything to grab the land from the rightful owners.
Gerard Butler shows there are no limitations when trying to find the truth. After a man's estranged wife disappears, he takes the law into his own hands while evading the authorities.
In this dramedy, Emma Thompson and Mindy Kaling explore workplace diversity. The host of a famous talk show, with falling ratings, hires her first and only female staff writer. 2019
After Gina gives birth to Lauretta, she handed her to her elder sister so she can take care of her. The happy story ends when she get pregnant for her own child.
Worlds collide in this South African romcom about a British drama teacher who persuades a small-town farmer to help her prepare for a movie role.
Leah is a single mother whose life is wreaked by circumstances beyond her control, her daughter made it worse when she breaks a costly vase in a rich home.
Magdaleen, a recluse in her late 70's, struggles to live without her deceased husband, Hendrik. Lionel her neighbour intrigues her.
In her quest for happiness, a conflicted wife juggles a secretive husband and an old flame's ambitious scheme, risking her own desires and loyalties.
Sherifa, a 19-year-old energetic and enthusiastic young lady who sells on the streets of Accra, goes through thick and thin to learn the act of dancing. 2022
Tolani Jacobs has always fought for the acceptance of her family.
A terrifying story about a holiday horror. A couple vacationing in Mexico fights to save their son from La Llorona, the evil spirit blamed for numerous missing children.
The death of Erica gives birth to the Legion, she terrorize her killer till she becomes the governor. Now she has refused to pay the price of taking the life of her lover.
A charming coming-of-age movie that revolves around a friendship between a teenage girl and a white lion. Lena discovers a white lion cub and has to protect it from poachers. 2021
A lady always finds herself in the wrong side of love and vows never to fall in love again, but meets a young CEO who appears different.
A chilling thriller. Friends, bound together by a murder they committed as teens, journey to celebrate their friendship in Belize, but they don't know their lives are in danger.
Golden Globe winner Jim Carrey learns hard lessons in this comedy. After being lied to by his lawyer father, a boy makes a wish for him to stop lying, it's a wish that comes true. 1997

A high school girl's life falls apart when her father is arrested for fraud and her mother develops a drinking problem. The once upstanding, affluent family is now a broken mess. Lien must find a way to keep the family afloat.
Desmond was rejected by Peace because of the lies Ifedi tells her, now her life hangs in the balance as she fights for the love she gave everything for.
It's inspection day at Sparadys beauty spa, and beauty therapist Dudu discovers that an unresponsive client is dead. A Silwerskermfees 2024 short film.
The meaning of family's redefined in this South African dramedy when a teenage beauty queen must cope with an eccentric father, an impressionable brother and a new romance.
After a breakup, a conservative girl falls for a possessive guy that made her break all her rules.
This gripping crime drama brings audiences into the greedy world of a bank teller, a small-time thug and a police inspector.
A rejected king feared by all is accused of making his mother blind. Light refuses to let his background pull him down, now light shines on him.

Mia, a depressed woman in a futuristic facility, is haunted by disturbing memories. She undergoes groundbreaking Virtual Reality therapy to process her trauma. As she navigates the surreal liminal space, she's forced to face her demons.
Lindelwa, a free spirit living her best young life, is forced to confront herself and her fears after a one-night stand with an old friend turns into an impromptu journey to motherhood.

Universally recognized as the greatest female skier ever, Lindsey Vonn attempts to break the record set by Sweden's Ingemar Stenmark for most World Cup wins. Vonn also shares her best and worst moments, on and off the slopes.
A man sends his wife packing when he can't make ends meet. When his financial situation changes, he decides to get his family back.
Regina Hall learns hard lessons in this comedy. A mean tech mogul gets what's coming to her when she is cursed and turned into her 13-year-old self on the eve of her biggest deal.
Two sisters raised as great academics by their middle-class father find themselves in the best school in town. However, they soon lose their focus due to peer pressure..
A gritty action thriller about a man who brokers a truce between a US governor and a cartel. But when the truce collapses, he does whatever it takes to protect his daughter. 2023
A starry female-led cast consisting of Saoirse Ronan and Emma Watson drives this book inspired romantic drama which reflects on the March sisters' transition to womanhood. 2019
A captivating mystery thriller. Suspicion falls on a woman's new neighbours when her teenage daughter goes missing.
After a group of loafers mess up a community with their flaws and character, they have to face the law or a greater power that will humble them.
A queen is determined to ensure her son ascends the throne after her husband's death. However, the story takes an unexpected turn when her son's fate diverges from the crown.
A young man gives up everything in life for this one true love, including his mother's life. But is it really worth it?
There is no one deadlier than a mother defending her young. This crime thriller follows a single mother protecting her daughter as they are caught in a heist at a storage facility. 2021
A lady comes back to the village and promise she is going to take some people back with her to London, little did the entire village know that they are all being tricked.
A gory horror comedy. A lonesome boy is given a week to make a friend or face being sent to an asylum. 2022
A gripping South African drama. A successful father who loses everything takes matters into his own hands to get back the one he loves most, his daughter.
A lady abandoned in the village with a son, she finds a man who loves her and her son and he wants to fight for her.
Chuma and his friends beat up their master Agumba and gets help from Obi who they later frustrate. In Chima's old age, the pain still lingers and he wished he could change time.
Ozor is a traditional man who will mix tradition with everything he touches, but married to a woman who has no love for culture. Will this marriage succeed?
Nonye escapes an abusive marriage with her daughter, staying with childhood friend Somkele. Tension rises when she falls for Somkele's love interest.
A young boy who witnessed the assassination of his mother at his young age, is determined to seek justice without minding whose ox is goad.
Two brothers take away the innocence of a young girl by raping her, now fate has brought them back together. Will be secret be known?
What is the length you will go to find true love? The prince of Ojoto kingdom has to become a commoner to find the one who truly love and cares for him.
After countless instances of bullying from Alice, Maya discovers that their single parents have fallen in love. Now, the two girls must navigate their complicated feelings.
In order to match up with the societal demands, a mother lies about her son's love life, but that lie soon turns to reality.

An eye-opening documentary. Follow the intimate and shocking stories of three young women inside Afghanistan's Badam Baugh Women's Prison, where half of the inmates are awaiting trial for 'moral crimes'.
It feels like a brawling love or twist of fate, as a one-night stand changes the destiny of Fiona and Henry. The cost of love.
Vivian is a career woman, busy and unable to make her love life blossom as she barely has time for it. She becomes heartbroken by her man and best friend, and that single act changes all.
Things go sour in life of a couple when a vindictive ex-girlfriend shows up with vengeance, with the help of her brother.
Tsholo falls in love with one of the men she's trying to con, she has to decide whether to follow her heart or fulfill her duty. 2021
Muna finds herself in an abusive relationship, until she meets a kind and loving man where she experiences happiness and healing, until her past catches up with her.
Under family pressure to marry, a man faces a dilemma when he disguises himself to win over a woman he's secretly admired for a long time.
When a lady accidentally causes her crush's memory loss, her life spirals into a web of lies, especially when she finally meets his mother and uncovers shocking truths.
A heartwarming romantic drama. A young American woman's summer takes an unexpected turn when her parents surprise her with a trip to Taipei for a cultural immersion program. 2023
Gina strikes Yvonne with a farting spell after all the help she has rendered to her. She did all these because she is jealous of her and her relationship.
An M-Net original film about infidelity. Jessica and her lover escape while her fiancé is away, but when he arrives to surprise her, he also finds himself in for a surprise.
Nelson is shocked when his father asks him to return to the office and work under a girl he can't stand, especially when he was meant to be her boss.
A couple are in shock when they learn their child is not theirs, this news stirs up a new phase, revealing many untold stories.
Samantha prioritizes her career over her marriage and, in an attempt to make amends, brings home a young woman who becomes a wolf in sheep's clothing, shattering her marriage.
Tony will lose his love, Oluchi, a woman who has done everything for him. This war started when Adam ask her hand in marriage.
Caught in the web of a notorious criminal's world, Benny, tasked with bringing him down, finds herself unexpectedly pregnant and deeply in love with him.
After investing his life savings to support his fiancée through university, she abandons him for a wealthier suitor, influenced by her mother's advice.
JB (nerdy, workaholic) has a crush on his neighbor, Becky. Every opportunity to ask her out has failed. Then comes the playboy Max, JB's friend. Who offers to help JB.
A baker strives to capture the love of a therapist with a lie only to find out that she is being used as a case study for his research project.
At the age of nine, Olivia's father sexually assault her and her mother passed away from the agony and grief. She is forced to move out but encounters same fate.
A woman falls for her friend's spouse after doctors mistakenly transfused blood which was not intended for her and contained mystical love portions.
Jane escapes her hectic life, finding solace with her neighbour, whom she trusts, only to discover his true, dangerous nature.
With her daughter adding to her troubles and Mmasi making strides in his life, Helen grapples with the weight of her past actions while her future hangs precariously in the balance.
Fred, from a perfect family with two sisters falls in love with Juliet but everything is about to get sour as his sisters will do everything to make them stay apart.
Mabel rejects Richard's proposal but agrees to co-parent. Infertility leads to a sperm donor plan, but Mabel's attraction complicates things.
Kanye and Justin are recently married and in a seemingly good place as a loving couple until something happens that seems to crumble the foundations of their union.
Molly put her husband up to get close to Hilda, make her fall in love with him and trust him. This would have ended well for Molly, but Eric genuinely falls in love with Hilda.
The murder of Marve, a 28 year old pregnant house wife leads to the unraveling of secrets and lies.
Reginald loses his job and struggles to find a new one as a scandal from his previous workplace continues to tarnish his reputation.
This warmhearted multi-story rom-com stars Diane Keaton and Jeremy Irons as part of an ensemble of colourful characters seeking love against the backdrop of a wedding.
A love story set in a time of uncertainty, as Charlotte falls for ex-APLA comrade Moscow who is struggling to find his place in this unstable new South Africa.
A lighthearted romantic film. A bespoke makeup manufacturer gets her chance at the big time when she teams up with an investment exec to make her products more marketable.
Scarlett Johansson (Avengers) stars in this pulsating action film. A woman accidentally absorbs an experimental drug during a black-market deal and is turned into a killing machine.
A psychological thriller mystery. A husband takes his family on a getaway to complete his first book but struggles to maintain his sanity after multiple visits from mysterious strangers.
A group of farm children discover 'dog training' and sets out to compete in the local dog-jumping competition. A Silwerskermfees 2024 documentary.
Fremah, a beautiful young lady, resists all advances from her mother to go to school. She decides to become a footballer and hang around with hoodlums.
A couple enmeshed in infatuation that led to unexplainable web of infidelity. A jobless graduate gets a wind of the sordid act and decides to make a fortune from a blackmail.
A king's throne is at risk of being overthrown, the only way to keep the throne is if his three princesses marry a man before his death in six months' time.
Ben Stiller and a star-studded cast lend their voices to this great animation. Four zoo animals escape and unwittingly find themselves far away in the wildness of Madagascar.
Enjoy a star-studded voice cast (Ben Stiller, Chris Rock), loads of action, superb visuals and plenty of gags ensure the third attempt by the animals to return to NYC is a win.
The gang returns for another crazy adventure. This time, their plane crash-lands, leaving them stranded in the middle of Africa, where Alex is reunited with his parents.
Madam Nneka and her Keke is the talk of town, she uses her unique relationship skills to win the heart of many.
Dakota Johnson joins the world of superheroes. A paramedic gains the ability to see the future and uses her power to protect three girls stalked by a killer.
Wilson and his wife finds themselves in a busy war when his wife has no time for their relationship, so his mother in-law devise a means to save her daughter's marriage.
Liam Neeson and his real son drive this father-son comedy-drama. The pair try to reconcile their troubled relationship while they give new life to their old home in Tuscany.
When 3 kings battle for a throne, the village can never have peace. This battle will give rise to a mafia king.
Toni Collette leads this hilarious action comedy. An American suburban mom's life takes a turn when she inherits her late grandfather's mafia empire in Italy.
Jon Hamm drives this crazy, over-the-top crime comedy based on actual events. A police chief is suddenly faced with the back-to-back murders of two women with the same name.
After seeing a call for an estranged grandchild meant to inherit from an aged relative, two notorious hustlers hatch a plan to impersonate and steal the wealth.
A strict detective joins forces with a resourceful Private Investigator to solve the murder of the Maid of Honor at a wedding in a wide suspect pool of friends and family.
Onyemaechi travels to the city in search of greener pastures. The maintenance money he sends to his parents is meant to make them suffer but they did not touch it.
Damon Wayans stars in this light-hearted military comedy. A former marine finds it hard adjusting to civilian life and so uses his extreme methods at a school military programme. 1995
A young couple excited about their new home is faced with trouble when their nosy landlady with unclear intentions drives them to their limits.
A busy father commits a financial crime at work and then pens down an emotional apology letter to his family whom he has neglected for so long to reveal unimaginable secrets.
Two kids mysteriously survive a meticulously planned murder where their parents perish. They are separated only to meet in a vicious court case involving the foster parents.
Mama G square's betrayal leads to her best friend's demise, who, before passing, cast a potent curse upon her.
A maid who works long hours for a demanding and tight-fisted boss, is laid off unexpectedly she must come up with a plan to help her to earn a living.
The talents of Oscar winner Meryl Streep and Amanda Seyfried tell the tale of a bride-to-be looking for her real father through the music of iconic 70s pop group ABBA.

column2: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
column6: Everyone is having the time of their lives in this sequel to the ABBA-inspired musical drama. Five years after the first film, Sophie learns more about her mother's past. 2018
CIA operatives work tirelessly to gather information on an infamous war criminal, although they make a breakthrough in their investigations, their methods border on questionable.

In 1980, car manufacturer Ford dumped 'tons of paint sludge and other waste' onto residential land. Since then, residents have suffered from a range of ailments, including increased rates of leukaemia, cancer and miscarriage
After being abandoned by their aid workers, a group of street kids regroup to redefine themselves in their community.
A thrilling horror. A group of college friends rent a smart house for a weekend of partying. They soon realise that Margaux, the house's AI system, has sinister designs for them. 2022
It is the first day of the new South Africa and also Marie's last day. A Silwerskermfees 2024 short film.
Working in makeshift grocery structures, two middle aged women are faced with a dilemma when their children decide to marry each other and in laws make impossible demands
Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, and Jessica Lange star in this period crime thriller. In late 1930s Bay City, a down-on-his-luck detective is hired to find the ex-lover of a heiress.
Adanna is accused of charming her sisters so that they do not get married before her, this however did not change anything as every man that comes for Adanna dies mysteriously.
Obiageli wants a good life for herself and decides to trade the happiness of her daughters. Now, she must pay the price of greed.
Pascal travels out after him and Adaline fell in love. Unfortunately, they lose contact. For 20years Adaline been searching for him hoping to get in contact with him someday.
A talented singer deserted her culture and passion of maskandi music after she was ridiculed by her peers. The death of her father forces her to face the past.
A compelling thriller by Paul Schrader. A man with a dark past has reinvented himself as a horticulturist. However, when his employer's grand-niece arrives, his past begins to sprout. 2022
A gang robs a hardware store and hijacks a random matatu as a getaway car. Mid- journey the matatu runs out of fuel and they discover the crew consists of an undercover cop.
Maria, a successful matchmaker, navigates love's complexities while arranging matches. When a prominent bachelor seeks her help, she decides to play matchmaker for herself.
Material and his gang are terrorizing the community because he has the support of his mother who is a native doctor but they are about to meet their doom.
Ije Ego's standards and status did not  allow any broke man to approach her for a relationship, until she meets Rooney.
In order to write a convincing novel, an ambitious young writer goes on a series of fake dates with a super rational tech entrepreneur for research purposes, but things soon get complicated.
A captivating and magical animated film inspired by Ukrainian folklore. Mavka faces an impossible choice between love and her duty as guardian of the Heart of the Forest.
Up against one of the deadliest crime syndicates in the city, May decides to go hunt for her twin to take her place on the slaughter table after the death of their father by the drug cartel.
Natalie Portman and Julianne Moore propel this drama loosely based on a true story. An actress visits a female sex offender she's about to play in a movie to study her and her family.

column2: Maya The Bee 3: The Golden Orb
column6: Maya and Willi return for another exciting adventure. They face their most challenging task yet: ensuring that a little ant princess arrives at her final destination safely.
This multigenerational romcom stars Diane Keaton and William H. Macy. A couple arranges for their parents to meet, but to everyone's surprise, they know each other too well.
When a village is filled with youths that are full of evil actions, the community seeks for just one person that can make a change.
A young man takes up the challenge of building up a young family while he pursues his dreams of higher education.
A musical twist on a modern classic. A new student is a hit with an A-list girl clique called the Plastics. However, everything changes when she falls for the wrong guy.
The sequel to the popular teen flick. A seventeen-year-old tomboy goes to a new high school, where she soon encounters the school's meanies.
A charming South African drama. The young daughter of a small-town family his fearful of a curse coming true, which is anyone named Gideon dies early in their family.
A man loses everything when he is accused of corruption. And when he is at his lowest, a young man appears claiming to be his son. Will it be the nail in his coffin or his salvation?
A business mogul's daughter finds love and happiness. Together, the couple decides it Is time to meet her father and share their relationship.
Mike Epps stars in this spoof comedy. A Chicago family move into a wealthy Beverly Hills neighbourhood, where, unbeknownst to them, it's "purge" night. 2016
Jason Statham returns to battle more giant sharks and other creatures. A research team explores the ocean's deepest depths, but their quest soon turns into a battle for survival. 2023
Villain-turned-hero Megamind is back, and so is his former villain team, The Doom Syndicate. He must keep up his evil appearance while assembling his own team to thwart their plan. 2023

A film about deep conversations and laugh-until-you-cry friendships - the only kind there should be, right? Louise and Megan form an adventure-filled friendship, only for Louise to discover it's all built on lies.
Just as Henk and Sofia's divorce is settled, they end up back in bed together. They couldn't make their marriage work, but maybe a new type of relationship could?
An independent businesswoman falls in love with a charming farmer and invests all her capital in his family's struggling farm and leaves her life behind in the city.
Thelma has all the money in the world, a beautiful apartment fit for queens and a loving and caring man, but one thing eludes her, her dream of becoming an actress.
Linda is every man's dream as she is respectful to her husband and everyone can see, and their love is admired by all. How can it be that her husband is unhappy when the doors are closed.
An action-packed sci-fi comedy that has become a modern-day classic. Special agent J (Will Smith) discovers that a secret agency is monitoring all extraterrestrial activity on earth.
Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones team up once again in this movie. Agent J travels back in time to stop an alien from killing Agent K and changing history. 2012
Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones return for another sci-fi adventure. After an old foe of Agent K resurfaces, Agent J is sent to find him and restore his memory to help with the case.
Chris Hemsworth and Tessa Thompson join the MIB fold in this action-packed addition to the franchise. The two agents battle their biggest foe yet: a mole in the MIB organization. 2019
Lincoln has everything going well for him until he is involved in an accident that confines him to a wheelchair, when Diane shows up, a glimpse of hope, but for how long?
Leaving her kids at a very young age to marry another man. Returning years later, to seek their forgiveness seeing them thriving.
After losing the ability to pay family debt and save his home, a young graduate is forced to develop a tough mentality and raise enough funds to retain his home.
A lady's mercilessness started when she is heart broken and her younger sister gets married to someone she loves.
A young, troubled lady discovers that the woman who is responsible for her entire life's woes, has returned to the city after 13years and moves for revenge.
The Nyati's come home for Christmas, ready to relax and reconnect, only to find their mother has signed them all up for a Choir Competition; and she is not taking no for an answer.
A young lady with big dreams sees an opportunity which she and her middle aged mother grabs with both hands without caution. Do they get to their dream land?
Teacher Zach falls in love with Mgbechi the local girl, this makes other teachers who are in love with Zach charm her and makes her mad, but love is the greatest of them all.

column2: Mia And Me: The Hero Of Centopia
